content.rendered:
Directed by Vishal Venkat

Written by Manikandan K. Vishal Venkat

Star Ashok Selvan (Vijay). Bhanupriya. Abi Hassan. Manikandan K. ((as Manikandan)). Anupama Kumar. Anju Kurian. Mimmo (Resort Manager). Nassar. Riythvika Panneerselvam ((as Riythvika)). Praveen Raja. K.S. Ravikumar. Reyaa

Language Tamil

Producers Ajmal Khan. Reyaa

Production AR Entertainment
